modName: Increase Harvest From Living off the Land Perk
modShortDescription: Sets parameters in progression.xml to increase the effectiveness of living off the land perk.
modDescription:
Sets parameters in progression.xml to increase the effectiveness of living off the land [perk](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-perks/).

**[Download](https://github.com/pahbi/Increased_Harvest/raw/main/moreharvest.zip)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/26048-increase-harvest-from-living-off-the-land-perk/).

**Credits:** [Pahbi](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/pahbi/)
